overview.address: Puducherry Technological University (Formerly Pondicherry Engineering College), Pillaichavady, East Coast Road, Puducherry - 60501

mode_of_admission.mode_of_admission: Self-Supporting Seats are filled through JoSAA / CSAB Counselling, and Government Quota seats are filled through Puducherry CENTAC counselling.
